realm.name: adventureguardian_wyrmling
realm.description: Grants write access to the application and grants access to all wyrmling features which is the first tier of the paid membership features.

realm.description: Grants write access to the application

realm.name: adventureguardian_dragon
realm.description: Grants write access to the application and grants access to all dragon features which is the third tier of the paid membership features.

realm.description: Grants write access to the application and grants access to all drake features which is the second tier of the paid membership features.

adventureguardian.name: adventureguardian

clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token

clientScopes.name: acr
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add acr (authentication context class reference) to the token

clientScopes.name: roles
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token

clientScopes.name: client_id
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect built-in scope: client id
